name: Kermit NICHOLSON, Petitioner v. Hon. Judge Arnold L. NEW, Respondent

parties: Kermit NICHOLSON, Petitioner v. Hon. Judge Arnold L. NEW, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of January, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
84 A.3d 322
Kermit NICHOLSON, Petitioner v. Hon. Judge Arnold L. NEW, Respondent.
No. 175 EM 2013.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 17, 2014.
